pokerapp.view.hand

Class CardViewModel

  • Object
    • CardViewModel

  • public class CardViewModel
extends Object
    Methods for selecting card images and rendering them based on their selection status ie: whether user has selected cards to change
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Steve
